evidence.claim: RemedyOne is committed to HIPAA compliance for safeguarding patient information.
The company utilizes FHIR standards for healthcare data interchange.
RemedyOne supports specific X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange.
AWS is one of the cloud services utilized by RemedyOne for their platform.
Their technical implementation includes health-tech rails specifically tailored for EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: RemedyOne integrates with EDI/X12 for health data exchanges, aligning with ICP use cases.
